titles.title: Suicide and Crisis Outreach Prevention Enhancement Act
Suicide and Crisis Outreach Prevention Enhancement Act
Suicide and Crisis Outreach Prevention Enhancement Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to expand the capacity of the suicide prevention lifeline and mental health crisis centers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
